testcase.name: TC01_User should see login Form if not authenticated
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed Then user assert that Login Form contains username, password and login button.passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC02_User should see validation errors if click the login button without fill the login form
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user assert that validation errors.....................................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC03_User should navigate to the dashboard and see welcome message if authenticate successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user verifies welcome message..........................................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC01_User should view create event form if click the Create Event button on dashboard
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed Then user verifies that create event form is visible........................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC02_User should view validation errors if click the Create Event button without fill the event form
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed Given user clicks Create New Event button...................................passed Then user assert that validation errors are visible.........................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC03_User should be able to add new participant when click the Add Participant button
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed And user clicks Add Participant button......................................passed Then user verifies that new participant was added...........................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC04_User should view error message if removes all participants
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed And user clicks delete button of all participants...........................passed Then user verifies that an error message has occurred.......................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC05_User should be able to create new event if fills all required fields and redirect to dashboard page with create successful message
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed Given user fills all required fields and clicks Create New Event button.....passed Then user verifies that redirected to dashboard page........................passed And user verifies that create successful message is visible.................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC06_User should be able to edit event. When user click the edit button all event fields must be filled according to editing event
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed Given user fills all required fields and clicks Create New Event button.....passed And user clicks edit button.................................................passed Then user verifies that all fields are correctly populated compared to the previous one.passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.name: TC07_User should be able to update event if required fields filled and redirect to dashboard page with update successful message
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed And user clicks create event button.........................................passed Given user fills all required fields and clicks Create New Event button.....passed And user clicks edit button.................................................passed Then user updates event name and click Update Event button..................passed And user verifies that redirected to dashboard page.........................passed And user verifies that update successful message is visible.................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user verifies that dashboard page has been loaded successfully.........passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user enters valid username and password.................................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user verifies that list of events is visible or notification message is visible.passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed
